title: Banks Prep Sale of BASF Coatings’ €4 Billion Buyout Debt
description: Banks are preparing to sell about €4 billion ($4.7 billion) of debt to finance Carlyle Inc.’s acquisition of BASF SE’s coatings business.
content: Banks are preparing to sell about €4 billion ($4.7 billion) of debt to finance Carlyle Inc.’s acquisition of BASF SE’s coatings business.
